column6: Leapin' Lizards! When Dr. Curt Connors reverts to his reptilian alter-ego Peter Parker's the only guy who can help. But does even Spider-Man stand a chance against every reptile in New York City? 32 PGS./All Ages
column8: | penciller (cover):Amanda Conner | penciller:Patrick Scherberger | writer:Zeb Wells
